problems.title: Last Digit of a^b
problems.description:
You are given two non-negative integers a and b. Your task is to find the last digit of a^b (a raised to the power b).

Input Format:
Two space-separated integers a and b.

Output Format:
Print a single digit, the last digit of a^b.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
2 10

Sample Output
4

Explanation:
2^10 = 1024, last digit is 4.
hintsList: Only the last digit of a matters. For each base digit (0â€“9), powers repeat in cycles of length at most 4. Use b % 4 (careful with b = 0) to index into the cycle.
